Message.Title: Samsung pays Microsoft $12-13 per Android
Message.Msg: MSFT will eventually take over Android and the world will be a better place. "According to the Trefis team Microsoft is receiving patent licensing fees from Samsung to the tune of $12-$13 per Android handset" http://wmpoweruser.com/samsung-estimated-to-pay-microsoft-12-13-per-android-handset-for-more-than-600-million-in-revenue-in-q2/
You are full of sh.it, SKANK. I've never such, such, such SCUM as you.
